tool.name: SNP Position to Polymarker Input

param.name: reference
param.label: Which reference to use?
param.help: If your contig from IWGSC contigs (such as IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4491815), then choose the first 1; if it is from CS pseudomolecule v1.0, then choose the 2nd

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This tool prepare polymarker input file from a SNP position in a contig or chromosome. The input file is a **tab-delimitted** file and each line looks like this (contig name, reference allele and altanative allele)
IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4491815 4083 T A
IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4552312 3240 G T
output file is a csv file (50 bp flanking sequences on each side) and looks like this:
CSS7AL4491815,7AL,AGGTCTCACAGATTTACATACTAGGGGCTCGAGGCCCAACATAGCTCGAT[T/A]ACATCATATCGAGTGGCATCGAGGAGGGGTTTGGCAACTCTGGTGGCCGT
CSS7AL4552312,7AL,CATATAGGACAAGATCCGAGAGCTCGTTTGCCATGATTAACCAGCCATGG[G/T]AGGCACCGCAGCAGGCCACAGCTTGGCCCCTGGGAAAGCTGACCTGAAAA
------
For more information, please check: https://github.com/pinbo/getKASP_pipeline
